name: jungle animals for good kids - free game
name_original: jungle animals for good kids - free game
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
This is a typical machine single slot game where you have to make some combinations of points to finish the level. Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful an animal image of the jungle becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
This is a shooter designed specifically for younger children. To complete a level, you must hit a number of targets. For each successful level your child wins a beautiful jungle animal image. Using the click screen in 20 levels suitable for children.

Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful an image of jungle animal becomes available in the image gallery.

Features:
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of jungle animals.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of jungle animals to release.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
